title: Have an Airwheel transportation Electric Scooter and Wave Goodbye to Traffic Jams
text: Have an Airwheel transportation Electric Scooter and Wave Goodbye to Traffic Jams Out of needs in modern life, more and more people have their own cars. As this situation goes along, traffic jams become an inevitable problem in big cities. USA, 30 September 2015 -- Out of need for travelling within the city, there is an increasing number of people having their own cars. As a result, traffic jams become an unavoidable part of urban life, especially for young office workers. They are seriously impacted by this problem and hope to have a powerful transport that can get them out of this dilemma. And Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter would be the best answer.Being the leading brand of the electric scooter industry, Airwheel is always dedicated to offering consumers a convenient and safe transport that can actually help people enjoy a better life. The intelligent scooter by Airwheel is small and portable, which does not take up much space or lead to any environmental pollution. In addition, since this transport is powered by electricity, it can save quite a sum of money. After all, the oil price is rather high right now, so a gas-consuming vehicle may cost a lot for young office workers. However, Airwheel self-balancing scooter only consumes 1 kWh for one hundred miles, which also shows the energy-saving feature of the vehicle. Apart from that, the absolute safeness is another characteristic of Airwheel scooter electric . It is equipped with high-tech intelligent chip that provides several protections for riders, including low battery protection, speed limit protection and tilting protection. Besides, since the transport is designed according to the principle of ergonomics, it is aligned with the human body movements. Therefore, it is quite easy for users to learn how to steer the vehicle. As to beginners, Airwheel has prepared training wheels for them. To begin with, they can add the wheels to the vehicle, which will help them learn faster in a safe manner. Riding such a transport as Airwheel intelligent scooter will surely get the users where they want to go conveniently and safely. By then, they can wave goodbye to traffic jams. # # #
